code: import'./Collaborator.css';import{FaWindowClose,FaHeart,FaRegHeart}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Collaborator=props=>{/* States */const{nombre,puesto,foto,equipo,id,fav}=props.value;const{mainColor,removeCollaborator,like}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"collaborator",style:{backgroundColor:mainColor},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaWindowClose,{className:"closeButton",onClick:()=>removeCollaborator(id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"collaboratorHeader",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:foto,alt:nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:puesto}),fav?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHeart,{className:"fullHeart",onClick:()=>like(id)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaRegHeart,{className:"emptyHeart",onClick:()=>like(id)})]})]});};export default Collaborator;
